title: Implement automated daily task generation at midnight

requirements.summary: Update the frontend DailyTasksSection component to automatically refresh and display newly generated tasks when they become available at midnight
acceptanceCriteria: Users see new daily tasks appear automatically at midnight without requiring a page refresh
Loading states are shown while tasks are being fetched
Previous day's tasks are properly cleared or archived when new tasks arrive

file_operations.description: Add real-time refresh logic to automatically fetch new daily tasks at midnight UTC. Implement a timer that calculates time until next midnight and triggers a query invalidation to refetch tasks. Ensure loading states are properly displayed during fetch operations and handle the transition from old tasks to new tasks smoothly.

Enhance the daily tasks query hook to support automatic invalidation at midnight. Add query key management to ensure proper cache invalidation when new daily tasks are generated. Ensure the query properly handles loading and error states during automatic refresh operations.
